string.text: Find %s for the Turner
You need to bring tools to the Turner so that he can upgrade the equipment.

You know, buddy, I'm actually a pretty good technician. I can fix both weapons and armor, and even make some upgrades! Well, I would, if the tools were normal. But where can you get them here? Maybe you can help me get some simple set, huh?
I need a set of tools for rough work. It should have tools and oils for working with weapons. If you can get it, I'll be grateful, I might even pay you!.. Probably.
Great, man! Oh, sorry, I have nothing to pay with. But I can give you a good discount!
Find %s for the Turner
You need to bring tools for delicate work to the Turner. He needs a more complete set to perform more complex upgrades of the equipment.
Hey, man, if you agree to get me a more complete set, you'll get an even bigger discount. Will you help me, buddy?
I need tools for delicate work. It should have everything I need. You'll be like a brother to me if you get it!
Wow, thanks, dude! Now I'll definitely get rich. Damn, I'll be successful!.. If, of course, I don't miss this chance. But for now, I can't offer you anything better than a discount. Sorry, buddy.
Find %s for the Turner
You need to bring %s to the Turner. He needs a unique set to perform even more complex upgrades of the equipment.
Hey, guy, if you find something worthwhile, I'll give you a discount!
I need tools for calibration. It should have everything I need. You'll be like a brother to me if you get them!

No way...! Oh man, thank you! Now I'll definitely get rich. Damn, I'll finally become successful!... If, of course, I don't miss this chance as well. But for now, I can't offer you anything better than a discount. Sorry, buddy.
%s for Shot
You need to find a set and bring it to medic Shot.
I need a good set of medical tools. I can quickly patch up minor injuries, but I don't have what it takes for anything more serious than a simple scalpel.

Thank you, friend! These tools will save the lives of many people. Thanks again for the tools.
